name: Leandro e Leonardo
description: '''Leandro e Leonardo''' were a Brazilian ''[[Sertanejo music|sertanejo]]'' duo. The two brothers (third and fourth of eight siblings), '''Leandro''' (born '''Luiz José da Costa''', August 15, 1961–June 23, 1998) and '''[[Leonardo (singer, born 1963)|Leonardo]]''' (born '''Emival Eterno da Costa''', born July 25, 1963), were from [[Goianápolis]].
